name: 李弘毅
objective:
本課程內容包括﹕熱力學第一定律、熱力學第二定律、結合兩定律之可用能分析、熱力性質關係式、動力循環、冷凍循環。
The contents of this course include the first law of thermodynamics, the second law of thermodynamics, combination of the two laws in the exergy analysis, thermodynamic property relations, the power cycles,and the refrigeration cycles.
schedule:
1. Introduction and Basic Concepts
2. Energy, Energy Transfer, and General Energy Analysis
3. Thermodynamic Properties
4. Energy Analysis of Closed Systems
5. Energy Analysis of Control Volumes
6. The Second Law of Thermodynamics
7. Entropy Analysis
8. Entropy Analysis
9. Midterm Exam
10. Exergy Analysis
11. Exergy Analysis
12. Thermodynamic Property Relations
13. Thermodynamic Property Relations
14. Power Cycles
15. Power Cycles
16. Refrigeration Cycles
17. Refrigeration Cycles
18. Final Exam
materials:
Textbook:
Thermodynamics: An Engineering Approach (9th Edition),Yunus A. Cengel, Michael A. Boles, Mehmet Kanoglu, McGraw-Hill, 2019.
References:
Fundamentals of thermodynamics (SI Edition), Claus Borgnakke, Richard E. Sonntag, Wiley, 2014.
